erevmax.02034.name: Quality Hotel 11 Gothenburg
erevmax.02034.description: All rooms at Quality Hotel 11 & Eriksbergshallen feature a flat-screen satellite TV and seating area. Each room features Scandinavian design and d�cor. Some rooms also have a balcony with river views. Free wellness centre access includes use of gym equipment and a dry sauna. Massage treatments can be booked on site. K�k & Bar 67 offers � la carte dining on the 6th and 7th floors. Guests can try lighter dishes in the bar or Caf� Eriksberg. Guests can reach the Gothenburg city centre by local transportation in 15 minutes. There are bus and ferry stops right next to Quality Hotel 11 & Eriksbergshallen.

erevmax.04393.name: Clarion Hotel The Hub
erevmax.04393.description: Clarion Hotel The Hub offers an organic breakfast buffet, free WiFi and free sauna, steam bath and swimming pool access. Clarion Hotel The Hub is a certified environmental-friendly hotel with its own urban garden Grow Hub. All rooms have air-conditioning, cable TV and a tea/coffee maker. Scandinavian inspired dishes and sustainable food can be enjoyed under the high glass roof of the � la carte Restaurant Norda on the top floor, with a concept by the famed chef Marcus Samuelsson. In summer, the terrace is a nice place for afternoon coffee or evening cocktails. Clarion Hotel The Hub has 24 meeting rooms with a capacity of up to 1850 people, including 10 boardrooms and a VIP room of 80 square metres. A 180 square metres gym is also available.

erevmax.568259.name: Clarion Hotel Helsinki
erevmax.568259.description: The Clarion Hotel Helsinki is located in the new J�tk�saari (Busholmen) urban investment district in the central West Harbour area. The hotel is a vibrant meeting place for both locals and hotel guests. How about some delicious drinks in the sky bar looking out over the city rooftops, a relaxed evening with chilled music in the Clarion Living Room or a delicious meal at our Kitchen & Table restaurant followed by a great nights sleep? Helsinkis city centre, shops and metro station are just a short walk away. Alternatively you can hop on a tram right next to the hotel.

erevmax.07119.name: Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central
erevmax.07119.description: The Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central enjoys a fabulous location right next to Stockholm Central Station. The citys amazing range of restaurants, shops, museums and nightclubs are all within easy reach! This is a cash-free hotel. The Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central is located within Stockholms World Trade Center, with a direct link to Stockholm Central Station. Stockholms amazing restaurants, shopping, night clubs and sights are all within easy walking distance. If you arrive by car, you can easily park in the parking garage right next door to the hotel.

otherPolicies.Others: The Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central is a cash-free hotel. Credit Cards accepted:

otherPolicies.pet_policy: At Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central we also welcome your four-legged friends. For SEK 250 extra per visit they can stay with you at the hotel. Guide dogs are of course welcome at no extra charge. But remember to tell us when you make your reservation, so that we can find a suitable room for you and your dog

erevmax.209093.name: Clarion Hotel Energy
erevmax.209093.description: Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. Certain units feature a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. You can engage in various activities, such as golfing and hiking. The hotel also offers bike hire. Stavanger Maritime Museum is 3 km from Clarion Hotel Energy, while Stavanger Art Museum is 3 km away. Sola Airport is 9 km from the property.
